text: Margaret Sullavan (May 16 1909-January 1 1960) was an American actress. She who acted mostly on the stage, but she was also in sixteen movies. She began her career in 1929. Four years later, she began her movie career with Only Yesterday. Mostly however, the actress preferred stage work. Margaret was born in Norfolk, Virginia. She died in near New Haven, Connecticut from an accidental barbiturate overdose on January 1, 1960. == Other websites == * Category:1909 births Category:1960 deaths Category:Actors from Virginia Category:American stage actors Category:Drug-related accidental deaths in the United States Category:People from Norfolk, Virginia
title: Margaret Sullavan
